title: Events
description: Does anyone know where I can sign up for battle of the bands event happening next month at the APK campus?

replies.content: Yeah on the UJ website under events the is a form you can fill out all you need is student number, name, and band name. GOOD LUCK! for the event
Thank You I found it, Here is the link to our latest song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v2AC41dglnM

title: Submitting work
description: I am having issues submitting work on Moodle is anyone else have the same problem.

replies.content: Download the app it will give you directions based on current location at the apb campus

title: Where do I get a student card at UJ?
description: I'm a first-year student at UJ and need to get my student card. Where do I go, and what documents do I need?

replies.content: You can get your student card at the Student Enrolment Centre (SEC) on the Auckland Park Kingsway (APK) campus. Bring your ID/passport and proof of registration.
Thanks! Is there a specific time I should go?
